plptool

Class ArchRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • plptool.ArchRegistry

  • public class ArchRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    This class associates an ISA implementation to its member classes. Developers porting an ISA to PLP Tool framework will have to register their implementation here.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ISA_PLPMIPS

    • Method Detail

      • getArchitecture

        public static PLPArchitecture getArchitecture(ProjectDriver plp,
                                              int ID)
        Return the specified architecture meta class. Register your ISA meta class here (extension of plptool.PLPArchitecture).
        Parameters:
        index -

      • registerArchitecture

        public static int registerArchitecture(java.lang.Class arch,
                                       int ID,
                                       java.lang.String strID,
                                       java.lang.String description)
        Register a class as an ISA metaclass
        Parameters:
        arch - Architecture class that extends plptool.PLPArchitecture
        ID - Integer ID for the ISA
        Returns:
        PLP_OK if the class is successfully registered, error code otherwise

      • getRegisteredArchitectureClass

        public static java.lang.Class getRegisteredArchitectureClass(int ID)
        Get a reference to an ISA class specified by its ID
        Parameters:
        ID - ID of the ISA meta class
        Returns:
        Reference to the ISA class, or null if it is not registered

      • getStringID

        public static java.lang.String getStringID(int ID)
        Get the string Identifier of the ISA implementation
        Parameters:
        ID - ID of the ISA meta class
        Returns:
        the string identifier of the ISA

      • getDescription

        public static java.lang.String getDescription(int ID)
        Parameters:
        ID -
        Returns:

      • setup

        public static java.lang.String[] setup(java.lang.String[] args)
        PLPToolApp calls this method during initialization

      • getArchList

        public static java.lang.Object[][] getArchList()
        Return a list of the ISAs currently registered in the PLPTool session.
        Returns:
        A two-dimensional object array of registered ISA classes. Information fields are: 0: ISA numerical ID, 1: reference to the ISA meta-class, 2: ISA string identifier.
